mapper.select: SELECT b_no, b_title, b_nick, b_count, TO_CHAR(b_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as b_date FROM normal_board where b_cate=#{title} order by b_no desc
mapper.update: UPDATE normal_board SET b_count=NVL(b_count,0)+ 1 WHERE b_no =#{b_no}
mapper.select: select ip_1||'.'||ip_2||'.*.*' re_ip, re_content, TO_CHAR(re_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') as RE_DATE, RE_ID, RE_NICK, re_no from (SELECT SUBSTR (IP, 1, INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 1) - 1) IP_1, SUBSTR (IP, INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 1) + 1, INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 2) - INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 1) - 1 ) IP_2, SUBSTR (IP, INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 2) + 1, INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 3) - INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 2) - 1 ) IP_3, SUBSTR (IP, INSTR (IP, '.', 1, 3) + 1) IP_4, RE_CONTENT, RE_DATE, RE_ID, RE_NICK, re_no FROM (SELECT re_ip IP, RE_CONTENT, RE_DATE, RE_ID, RE_NICK, re_no FROM reply where b_no=#{b_no}))
mapper.insert: insert into reply values ( mom_reply_no.nextval, sysdate, #{re_content}, #{re_id}, #{b_no}, #{re_nick}, #{re_ip})
